advanceTimePeriod() - Method in class Baseball
Advances the inning of the game as long as there 3 outs, and ends the game when conditions are met
advanceTimePeriod() - Method in class Basketball
Shows the time period of the game being played, either one of the 4 quarters, one of 3 OTs, or game over
advanceTimePeriod() - Method in class Football
Moves the games time period forward, while also ending the game when necessary
advanceTimePeriod() - Method in class Hockey
Moves the games time period forward by 1 period, ending the game when necessary
advanceTimePeriod() - Method in class Sport
Abstract function that will advance the time period of the game, specific to each game's rules

Takes in the user's input ant applies the correct game action, moving runners as well
